column1: Table 5.7: Estimate for rehabilitation of Wellangiri Wewa in Goodwood GND (512C)

column2: Desilting by PC 20 or 30 Excavator in a loose soil without pontoon cutting depth 300mm

Vegetative cover improving with Areca nut seedling @ 1.5m spacing in a single row, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and dense planting at 500mm grid interval, applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer, mulching with straw/ banana tree skin and maintenance
Vegetative cover improving, replanting bamboo species and vetiver grass or riparian species at 500mm grid interval including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenance
